title: The Red Menace:  How Lipstick Changed the Face of America, an interview with Ilise S. Carter, part 2
itunes:title: The Red Menace:  How Lipstick Changed the Face of America, an interview with Ilise S. Carter, part 2
description:
In part two of this week's episode, Ilise S. Carter joins us again to speak about lipstick in the context of feminism, Bladerunner and Boy George vs. 90s hair bands like Poison and Motley Crüe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
